aka: The Tiger Leaps and Kills, but it Will Die... It Will Die...

director.name: 圣地亚哥·阿尔瓦雷斯 Santiago Álvarez

this_title: El tigre saltó y mató, pero morirá... morirá...
trans_title: 老虎跳跃和杀戮，但它会死……它会死……
The Tiger Leaps and Kills, but it Will Die... It Will Die...
introduction: Cuban filmmaker Santiago Alvarez's hurried response to the 1973 Chilean coup d'état rests upon the music of Victor Jara, the folk singer who was brutally murdered within days after Augusto Pinochet assumed power. Connecting events in Chile to other repressive police crackdowns throughout the world (and specifically to C.I.A. malfeasance), Alvarez calls for solidarity in a characteristically bravura choreography of text and image.
chinese_title: 老虎跳跃和杀戮，但它会死……它会死……
foreign_title: El tigre saltó y mató, pero morirá... morirá...
